title: Be Notified - Orbital Asɔredan
heading: Wobɛbɔ Wo Amanneɛ Bere a Ɛsɔre
description:
Wɔ November 28, 2025 no, Orbital Asɔredan no bɛforo.
Gyae wo e-mail no, na yɛbɛka akyerɛ wo bere a adu ahunmu no.

form.successMessage: Yebedu wo nkyɛn bere a ɛforo kɔ soro no.
form.errorMessage: Biribi ankɔ yiye. Yɛsrɛ sɛ sɔ hwɛ bio.
